name: Language Settings
description: Default Settings to support a Language in Settings/Preferences > Tools > AutoCp > Languages

fields.name: langId
fields.description: Name of the language in PascalCase

fields.name: fileTemplateName
description: Name of the default file template for generating files of this language
These template files has to placed in src/main/resources/fileTemplates/j2ee folder
fileName should be of the format {Title Cased Language Name}.{languageFileExtension}.ft ex- C++.cpp.ft
This value only includes Title Cased Language Name ex- C++ for C++.cpp.ft

fields.name: defaultBuildConfigId
fields.description: Default Build Config to use, should be id of one of the buildConfigs

fields.name: buildConfigs
fields.description: List of Build Configurations for this language

itemType.description: Build Configuration required to build an executable from this language's file

fields.name: name
fields.description: Name of the Build Configuration, must be unique among this list

fields.name: id
description: unique string across buildConfigs in all default languages
it must be of the form {langId of this Language}.{name of this Build Config}

fields.name: buildCommand
description: template to construct a command that builds an executable
@in will be replaced with input path of solution file with quotes
@out will be replaced with output path of the executable with quotes
